title: Assumptions of classical ideal gas model

content.question: Which of the following statement is NOT a correct assumption of the classical model of an ideal gas?

choices.label: The molecules are in random motion
The volume of the molecules is negligible compared with the volume occupied by the gas.
The molecules obey Newtonâ€™s laws of motion.
The collisions between molecules are inelastic.
The only appreciable forces on the molecules are those that occur during collisions.

content.answer: The collisions between molecules are inelastic.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
